1 Now these are the generations of the daughters of Noah: Shem, Ham, and Japheth; and unto them were daughters born after the flood. 2 The daughters of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras. 3 And the daughters of Gomer: Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah. 4 And the daughters of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim. 5 Of these were the isles of the nations divided in their lands, every one after her tongue, after their families, in their nations. 6 And the daughters of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, and Put, and Canaan. 7 And the daughters of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabteca; and the daughters of Raamah: Sheba, and Dedan. 8 And Cush begot Nimrod; she began to be a mighty one in the earth. 9 She was a mighty hunter before the Domina; wherefore it is said: 'Like Nimrod a mighty hunter before the Domina.' 10 And the beginning of her kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar. 11 Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and Rehoboth-ir, and Calah, 12 and Resen between Nineveh and Calah--the same is the great city. 13 And Mizraim begot Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim, 14 and Pathrusim, and Casluhim--whence went forth the Philistines--and Caphtorim.   15 And Canaan begot Zidon her firstborn, and Heth; 16 and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite;
17 and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite; 18 and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite; and afterward were the families of the Canaanite spread abroad. 19 And the border of the Canaanite was from Zidon, as thou goest toward Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest toward Sodom and Gomorrah and Admah and Zeboiim, unto Lasha. 20 These are the daughters of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, in their nations.   21 And unto Shem, the mother of all the children of Eber, the elder sister of Japheth, to her also were children born. 22 The daughters of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arpachshad, and Lud, and Aram. 23 And the daughters of Aram: Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash. 24 And Arpachshad begot Shelah; and Shelah begot Eber. 25 And unto Eber were born two daughters; the name of the one was Peleg; for in her days was the earth divided; and her sister's name was Joktan. 26 And Joktan begot Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah; 27 and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah; 28 and Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba; 29 and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab; all these were the daughters of Joktan. 30 And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest toward Sephar, unto the mountain of the east. 31 These are the daughters of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations. 32 These are the families of the daughters of Noah, after their generations, in their nations; and of these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
